::: {.cell .caption-margin layout-align="center" fig.format='svg'}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(
  asia, 
  xlim = c(bbox["xmin"], bbox["xmax"]), 
  ylim = c(bbox["ymin"],bbox["ymax"]),
  col = "red",
  graticule = TRUE,
  axes = TRUE,
  main = "Les pays d'Asie"
)

plot(
  st_geometry(world), 
  add = TRUE
)
```
